alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Allegany; Extreme Western Allegany; Garrett (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 17 at 3:49AM EST until February 18 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...South to southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of western Maryland, the northern and central Shenandoah Valley of Virginia, and the Potomac Highlands of eastern West Virginia. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Allegany; Extreme Western Allegany; Garrett
